GK19gp23-33u:437: atra sukha-tanv iti bhavatety asya cittam ity asya vā viśeṣaṇam /
GK19gp23-33u:438: apinaddham iti bandhanābhāve bandhane vā na ceti pūrva-nahi-vat /
GK19gp23-33u:441: nāśaya yadi na hi mādṛśam api sa hi saṅkramitā sakhideva //JGc_1,23.64//
GK19gp23-33u:443: mādṛśam ity asmat-sadṛśe vā jane' smad-arthe vā /
GK19gp23-33u:444: lakṣmī-sukha-dadam api bhavataḥ padam ahaha pulindī-bhavyam /
GK19gp23-33u:445: spṛṣṭaṃ yad-avadhi dṛṣṭaṃ tad-avadhi sarvaṃ jagad-apasavyam //
GK19gp23-33u:447: atrāpasavyaṃ pratikūlam ity ubhaya-pakṣe' pi samañjasam /

GK19gp23-33u:450: dṛśyata iti tava pada-dhūlyāplavam icchaty api pati-hṛdayā //

GK19gp23-33u:454: atrāpi-śabdaḥ samuccaye pūrvavat kākvā niṣedhe vā /

GK19gp23-33u:459: dattābhaya-bhuja-vakṣaḥ-śrī-yuja dāsyo vayam api te' tra //JGc_1,23.69//
GK19gp23-33u:461: tava muralī-kalam api ca rūpa-balam anubhūyābhavad eva /

GK19gp23-33u:464: vyaktaṃ vraja-bhaya-hara-līlā-caya devas tvam asi sa ko' pi /

GK19gp23-33u:530: [7] tataś ca nānā-narma-karmaṭhatayā haṭhavattayā ca kṛṣṇena kiṃcid asaṃkoce viracite,
GK19gp23-33u:532: nicolādi-viparyaye ca paricite sāsraṃ bahu vihasya tad iha sarvam eva yathāvat paryācitam ācere /

GK19gp23-33u:534: [9] yatra labdha-harṣaś candramasam api nija-dakṣiṇataḥ samākarṣann iva saṅgitayāṅgīcakāra /

GK19gp23-33u:543: saukhyaṃ lakṣyam abhūt parāvṛti-vidhāṃ cāveśitā nirmame //JGc_1,24.5// [śārdūla]

GK19gp23-33u:572: [15] tad etad, yathā-tad evaṃ bhrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ jāta-prasare' py alabdhāvasare sa-tṛṣṇa-kṛṣṇa-sahita-mahita-mahilāvisare' bhilaṣita-vilasitāya viralatā na jātā /
GK19gp23-33u:573: [16] ajātāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ kṛṣṇayā taraṅga-kara-nikara-citam aharahar avakalitaṃ pulina-viśeṣam eva tad-ucitaṃ prabalam avakalayāmāsa /
GK19gp23-33u:574: [17] balānujanmā yaḥ khalu hima-bālukeva bālukā yasmiṃs tādṛśa iti parama-śubhra-śubhra-guṇatayā vibhrājate sma /

GK19gp23-33u:577: yatraiva ca kalinda-tanayā svayaṃ valita-sakhīnayā saugandhika-sugandha-gandhavāha-vahanādinā sevāṃ vahati sma /
GK19gp23-33u:578: [20] tatra cātra śrī-keśavaḥ praveśam anubhūya pratipreyasy api yugmībhūya bāhu-prasārādi-līlāṃ śīlayāmāsa /
GK19gp23-33u:579: [21] sā ceyaṃ paramarahasyeti rahasy eva kiñcid vyasyate /
GK19gp23-33u:582: bāhū tu tat-karaṇatāṃ ciram īyatur na /
GK19gp23-33u:583: yo yasya naiti vaśatāṃ sa kathaṃ nu tasya
GK19gp23-33u:587: kṛtaṃ ca parirambhanaṃ na parihartum īśāv amū
GK19gp23-33u:589: kathañcid api vīrudhā bhavati cet taroḥ saṃgamas
GK19gp23-33u:590: tayoḥ katham apṛktatā svayam anīhayor jāyatām? //JGc_1,24.8// [pṛthvī]
GK19gp23-33u:593: tayos tāṃ vicchetuṃ param ahaha nānā-vilasita-

GK19gp23-33u:630: svādhīnaṃ sapadi pratisvam asakṛt tatrātigarvaṃ dadhuḥ /

GK19gp23-33u:632: tasyāntar-hitatā hiteti kila so' py antardadhe mādhavaḥ //JGc_1,24.17// [śārdūla]
GK19gp23-33u:634: mama paramam uddeśyam eva vismṛta-deśyam abhūt,
GK19gp23-33u:635: yataḥ sarvābhir eva nirviśeṣaṃ ramamāṇe mayi ramā-śiromaṇīyamānā rādhāpi sādhāraṇatāṃ gatā /
GK19gp23-33u:636: [25] kiṃ ca, sva-manoratha-prathanāyāṃ rādhāyāḥ prathamā prathamānā-gamanatā samprati pratipannā,
GK19gp23-33u:637: tasmān mahā-maha eva mama hitāya mahīyate /
GK19gp23-33u:638: sa ca śāradatā-viśāradatāyām asyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ rāsa-rasa eva tūrṇaṃ pūrṇatām arhati /
GK19gp23-33u:639: eṣa tu sarvāsām aikamatya-pratipatty-anusārata eva sāratām prasārayati /
GK19gp23-33u:640: aikyamataṃ ca pratyekaṃ sābhimānāntarāsu parāsu kiñcin mad-udāsīnatā-paraṃ dāsī-kartum āsīdati /
GK19gp23-33u:641: tasmād aśeṣa-guṇādhikāṃ rādhikām ādāya tirodhāya sthāsyāmi iti /
GK19gp23-33u:642: [26] tad etad vibhāvya bhāvyam arthaṃ sādhayan,
GK19gp23-33u:643: mādhavas tatra tatrālasa-kara-caraṇādi-kriyāṃ priyāṃ priyāṃ praty uvāca-nūnaṃ vañcita-kāñcī-dhvanitayā kayācid apy atra sthīyata iti nāsthīyate /
GK19gp23-33u:646: mayā tu samayā mṛgayamāṇatāṃ nirmāya nātisamaya-virāmam āgamanīyam /
GK19gp23-33u:648: tatas tataḥ sarvataś cāntardhāya rādhayā saha sahasā jagāma /
GK19gp23-33u:649: [28] atha samaya-katipaya-vyatyayam asahamānā sā sā ca tatas tata utthāya prasthāya ca tam anvicchantīti bhramaṇāt kramaśaḥ eka-dvāditayā paramparaṃ militāḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:650: militāś ca tāḥ paramparam apratītitaḥ śapathaṃ prathamānāḥ kṛṣṇa-patham evānveṣayāmāsuḥ / kintu-
GK19gp23-33u:651: anveṣṭuṃ kṛṣṇam iṣṭaṃ nikaṭam abhigataṃ cintayitvā pradūnāḥ
GK19gp23-33u:652: kartuṃ tan naiva śekuḥ param ahaha gatāḥ klāntim etā nipetuḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:653: sthitvā tadvac cirāya sphuraṇa-mayam amuṃ prāpya sarvāḥ samantān
GK19gp23-33u:654: matvānyo' nyaṃ tam eva pratihata-matayaś cakrur āliṅganādi //
GK19gp23-33u:658: kṛṣṇāyante sma tā eva sarva-pālakatām itāḥ //JGc_1,24.19// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp23-33u:659_0: [29] atha kathañcid anusaṃhita-bahirarthāḥ samayaṃ gamayitum asamarthāḥ pūrvābhyāsa-vaśān
GK19gp23-33u:659_1: nija-rakṣāyā vaśān nikhila-sukhada-śīlāṃ bālyādi-katal-līlāṃ gātum ārabdhās tad-āveśa-parirabdhā babhūvuḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:660: [30] tatra ca kṛṣṇam anvicchantyas tata ito gacchantyas taru-vallī-pallīm api muhur api pṛcchanti sma,
GK19gp23-33u:666: adyāpi smṛtam uttapaty ahaha mac-cittaṃ yad etā muhuḥ
GK19gp23-33u:667: pṛcchanti sma hariṃ viyoga-vidhurā hā hā tarūn apy aho /
GK19gp23-33u:668: āstāṃ tan mama hṛdy aruntudam idaṃ gītābhir etat-kṛte
GK19gp23-33u:671: yat pṛcchābhiniveśaś caivam apagacchati sma, yathā-
GK19gp23-33u:678: [32] tataś ca kṣitim eva praśna-lakṣitī-kṛtavatyaḥ, yathā-
GK19gp23-33u:679: aho kim akaros tapaḥ kiyad ihorvi yac chrī-hareḥ
GK19gp23-33u:681: trivikramaja-vikramāt kim iva tat tvayā sambhṛtaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:682: varāha-parirambhataḥ kim athavā kvacit kintu na //JGc_1,24.23// [pṛthvī]
GK19gp23-33u:683: pṛthvī kṣamā ca nāmnā tvaṃ tat-padāṅkam udaṅkitā /
GK19gp23-33u:684: tasmāt tvām eva taṃ praṣṭuṃ tā vayaṃ gatim āgatāḥ //JGc_1,24.24// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp23-33u:685: [33] tad evaṃ sarvāsu tarv-ādikaṃ pṛcchantīṣu tata itaś ca gacchantīṣu tadīyaṃ saurabhyaṃ parirabhya,
GK19gp23-33u:687: tad-vaidagdhī-digdha-snigdha-hṛdayā rādhā-sakhī-samudayā hariṇīṃ prati kṛta-praṇayāḥ sānumodatayā hāri vyāharanti sma-
GK19gp23-33u:689: tanvan dṛśāṃ sakhi sunirvṛtim acyuto vaḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:698: [34] atra khalu eṇeti patnīti sakhīti pada-trayeṇa-he praśasta-netre /
GK19gp23-33u:702_0: [35] priyayā samam acyutaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ śliṣṭatayā tasyāḥ sakāśād aviśliṣṭaḥ sann adasīya-śobhā-kṛtāsaṅgair
GK19gp23-33u:702_1: aṅgair yuṣmākaṃ tādṛśāṃ dṛśāṃ kevala-sva-darśanajānandād apy atiśayitam ānandam utkarṣayan
GK19gp23-33u:703: tatra tan-mithuna-ślāghā-garbha-vacanena hetuṃ racayanti kānta iti /
GK19gp23-33u:706: kīdṛśyāḥ? mālāyāḥ kāntā-parama-puṇyena parama-sarva-sādguṇyena tasyāpi lālasasya yā paramāspada-rūpā,
GK19gp23-33u:708: ataḥ santata-paricaya-viśeṣeṇa tat-saurabhya-viśeṣaṃ parirabhya sphuṭam ābhis tathā samupalabhyata ity arthaḥ
GK19gp23-33u:710: [36] atha tāṃ tad-darśana-jātena harṣeṇa samprati tad-viyoga-jātena tarṣeṇa sthagita-vacanām āśaṅkya,
GK19gp23-33u:711: tena ca tayoḥ saṅgamam eva niṣṭaṅkya,
GK19gp23-33u:713: tatra pallavādi-bhara-namrāṇāṃ kamrāṇāṃ purūṇāṃ tarūṇām api tadīya-sauvidallādi-bhṛtya-viśeṣa-bhāvena tad-vandanam utprekṣya,
GK19gp23-33u:714: priyayā saha vihāra-ratena tena teṣām abhinandanaṃ sandihānās,
GK19gp23-33u:717: latā imāḥ pṛcchata yā na lokitāḥ
GK19gp23-33u:722: punar akasmād akhilaśubhapadyāni tadīya-padanalinayor amalināni padāni dadhānā,
GK19gp23-33u:723: vasudhā sudhām iva sudhāmāvaliṃ tāsām anyāsām api tadapratītispṛśi dṛśi kirati sma,
GK19gp23-33u:726: dade na hīty avamṛśatī punar dade /

GK19gp23-33u:3930: kiṃ no ækariṣyan kula-vṛddha-bāndhavāḥ [BhP 10.39.28] ity uktvā,
GK19gp23-33u:3933: kṛṣṇa-dūte samāyāte uddhave tyakta-laukikāḥ [BhP 10.47.9] ity ādinā,
GK19gp23-33u:3935: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ bhrātṝn patīn putrān svasṝn api /
GK19gp23-33u:3936: yad-arthe jahima dāśārha dustyajān sva-janān prabho //[BhP 10.65.11] ity ādinā,
GK19gp23-33u:3937: yā dustyajaṃ svajanam ārya-pathaṃ ca hitvā ity ādinā ca /
GK19gp23-33u:3938: [239] atra patīn putrān iti yad uktaṃ,
GK19gp23-33u:3939: tat khalu gauṇīm eva vṛttim anukramya,
GK19gp23-33u:3940: na tu mukhyām iti bhavat-praśnānukrameṇa prakhyāsāmi /
GK19gp23-33u:3942: tary evam ācakṣmahe-narakādānīta-guru-kumāratayā jita-dharmarāja-dhāmā rājad-aghajin-nāmā so' yam etad anurakta-jano' py adharmasya kalayāpi spraṣṭuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca na śakyata eva /
GK19gp23-33u:3943_0: kintu lajjā-mātraṃ tasya tasya ca maryādā-paryāpakam iti vastutas tu na kevalaṃ rāgata
GK19gp23-33u:3943_1: eva tās tādṛśīṃ gati-mārgatāḥ kintv anādi-siddha-svabhāvatayā tad-vadhū-bhāvataś
GK19gp23-33u:3944: tad etad balarāmoddhavau ca suṣṭhu jānīta iti tāv api praṣṭavyau,
GK19gp23-33u:3945: anyathā tāsu tat-sandeśa-haratā tayor na deśa-rūpatām āsīdet /
GK19gp23-33u:3946: [240] punas tau vakṣyataḥ-vatsaḥ kim idam anusandadhāti ?
GK19gp23-33u:3947: sā vakṣyati-sa ca pūrvaṃ kiñcid anusaṃhitavān āsīt /
GK19gp23-33u:3950: tau vakṣyataḥ-tāsāṃ tad-artha-prāṇa-jihāsāṃ kim asau jānāti?
GK19gp23-33u:3951: sā vakṣyati-uktam eva samyag vidann āsta iti /
GK19gp23-33u:3952: [241] yataḥ pūrvam apy uddhave tathā samudbuddhaṃ kṛtavān,
GK19gp23-33u:3953: yathā ca tad-vacanaṃ satya-vacasaś ca gāsyanti-
GK19gp23-33u:3954: gacchoddhava vrajaṃ saumya pitror nau prītim āvaha /
GK19gp23-33u:3957: mām eva dayitaṃ preṣṭham ātmānaṃ manasā gatāḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:3958: ye tyakta-loka-dharmāś ca mad-arthe tān bibharmy aham //
GK19gp23-33u:3959: mayi tāḥ preyasāṃ preṣṭhe dūra-sthe gokula-striyaḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:3963: [242] atra mat-sandeśaiḥ iti mayy āveśya manaḥ kṛṣṇe vimuktāśeṣa-vṛtti yat anusmarantyo māṃ nityam acirān mām upaiṣyatha [BhP 10.47.36] iti paryavasānair ity arthaḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:3965: me vallavyaḥ ity atra tu viśeṣo' py asti,
GK19gp23-33u:3966: tasmāt tad eka-vrata-jīvana-vratānāṃ tad-bhāryāṇāṃ nānyā gatir nyāyyā /
GK19gp23-33u:3969: satyam asmākaṃ prakaṭatare' pi loka-dharma-ghaṭanānarha-pratikāre' pi tāsāṃ vighaṭana-duḥkhe yad adyāpi snuṣākaraṇa-spṛhā nāpayāti,
GK19gp23-33u:3970: pratyuta sātatyata eva tāsu snuṣābhānaṃ vibhāti /
GK19gp23-33u:3974: [245] atha tau spaṣṭaṃ vakṣyataḥ-rahasyam idaṃ lokāḥ kathaṃ maṃsyante /
GK19gp23-33u:3975: sā vakṣyati-māyāyāḥ svabhāva-vyāpitir iyam avyabhicāritayā lakṣyate,
GK19gp23-33u:3978: [246] yataḥ sarveṣām api sat-saṅkalpānām upari prabhavator bhavator nigūḍhā yā tad-artham utkaṇṭhā,
GK19gp23-33u:3979: sā hy adhunā parāṃ koṭim ārūḍhā jhaṭiti rūḍha-kāryā bhaved eva /
GK19gp23-33u:3980: tau vakṣyataḥ-svīyām ananya-sambandhitāṃ tāḥ kathaṃ vidanti /
GK19gp23-33u:3981: [247] sā vakṣyati-pūrvaṃ sa vo hi svāmī bhavati iti durvāsaso vacanenāpi samyaṅ nāviduḥ kintu paścād viduḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:3984: ataevoktam-api bata madhu-puryām ārya-putro ædhunāste [BhP 10.47.21] iti /
GK19gp23-33u:3985: [250] tau vakṣyataḥ-tāsāṃ śvaśuraṃ-manyādīnāṃ ye' nugatās te prāyeṇānutāpaṃ prāpsyanti /
GK19gp23-33u:3986: [251] atha sā tu puruṣam iva vakṣyati-tat kim āsāṃ parama-sādhvīnāṃ mādhvīkavan madhura-snigdhatāvalitānāṃ duṣkara-taraṇa-duḥkha-bhāskara-puṣkalatāpa-śuṣkatā soḍhavyā /
GK19gp23-33u:3987: tathā sarva-dhurīṇatā-pravīṇasya nija-kula-dhurandharasya govardhana-dharasya durdhara-lajjā-bhāra-sajjanam anumodanīyam /
GK19gp23-33u:3988: vastutas tu teṣām api na sukha-bhaṅga-prasaṅgaḥ yad-dhāmārtha-suhṛt-priyātma-tanaya-prāṇāśayās tvat-kṛte [BhP 10.14.35] iti śrī-śuka-vacanād api /
GK19gp23-33u:3991: [252] tad etan nirūpya sā punaḥ sahāsaṃ vakṣyati-sāmprataṃ pratataṃ kutukāntaraṃ bhavadvyāṃ kila nāvakalitam /
GK19gp23-33u:3992: yat khalu yuṣman-nandana ānanda-dyūte tāsāṃ patiṃmanyāṃst tat-pitrādi-paryantaṃ sarvaṃ jitavān /
GK19gp23-33u:3993: lajjām eva sajjan na tad-gṛham ānītavān iti /
GK19gp23-33u:3994: [253] tad idaṃ guptam api kṛtam ādi-varāha-nāmā bhagavān api sva-purāṇe sākṣitayā lakṣayatīti sarvathātra nānyathā mantavyam / yathā-
GK19gp23-33u:3998: [254] tau vakṣyataḥ-tat-pitrādīnāṃ tan-mitrādīnāṃ vā ko vyavasāyaḥ ?
GK19gp23-33u:3999: [255] sā vakṣyati-te' pi mayopadiṣṭaṃ tattvīkṛtya pṛṣṭa-kṛtyās tad idam uddiṣṭavantaḥ-
GK19gp23-33u:4005: [257] sā vakṣyati-mat-pṛṣṭābhis tābhir apy evam ādiṣṭam-
GK19gp23-33u:4008: tathā rādhādīnāṃ para-gṛha-gatir yā bata vipat
GK19gp23-33u:4009: kathaṃ tasyā nityā sthitir abhimatā hanta suhṛdām //JGc_1,33.106// [*9]
GK19gp23-33u:4010: [*9] This verse is repeated in Uttara-campū, 31.43.
GK19gp23-33u:4011: [258] tau vakṣyataḥ-atha rādhikādīnām ārtānāṃ kā vārtā ?
GK19gp23-33u:4013: deyam adhīnaṃ kārtsnyenābhivyāptyā ca tatra kṛṣṇe svam /
GK19gp23-33u:4017: yatas tāsāṃ marma-prakaṭana-karmaṭhatayā mayā pṛṣṭam-bho vipaścitaḥ kāścid evaṃ vadanti /
GK19gp23-33u:4021: [262] tarhi kathaṃ tāsām apy anyāsām iva patitayā tat-sampatti-kāmanā-nikāmam antaranuvartata iti ?
GK19gp23-33u:4022: [263] tad etad ākarṇya pāṭala-paṭala-savarṇa-varṇinyas tā vara-varṇinyas tad idam avarṇayanta /
GK19gp23-33u:4023: [264] hanta / tāsām eva savirodhas tad-avarodhaḥ sambhavatā-dṛtīyamānā dvitīya-pati-bhāvanā ca,
GK19gp23-33u:4026: sā vā kathaṃ prema-prathana-mayī syād iti na budhyāmahe /
GK19gp23-33u:4027: [265] asmākam yadyapy asau pārśva-gato raho-gatas tathāpi tasyāṅghri-yugaṃ navaṃ navam [BhP 1.11.34] ity eva bodha-viṣayo bhavati / kintu-
GK19gp23-33u:4032: [266] yad asmākaṃ bālyād eva tasmin nija-rmaṇatā-bhāvanāṃ dūrīkartum āgraham urīkurvanti,
GK19gp23-33u:4036: [268] sā vakṣyati-tato mayā hasitvā śavasitvā ca tābhyaḥ pratyāśā-mātraṃ pratyāsāditam asti /
GK19gp23-33u:4038_0: tās tu daivatas tāvan-nija-prāṇa-valalbhasya valalbhatvneālābhāl labdha-mahā-duḥkhās
GK19gp23-33u:4038_1: tatra ca svasyānya-hasta-patitatayā jugupsitaṃ-manyatā śuṣkās tatra ca priyāpriya-viprakarṣa-sannikarṣataḥ
GK19gp23-33u:4038_2: prāpta-mano-dharṣās tatra ca nirantaraṃ śaṅkamānaiḥ patiṃ-manyādibhir maṅkṣu maṅkṣu-kṛta-nivāraṇa-bhartsanādi-nikarṣās
GK19gp23-33u:4038_3: tatas tata eva ca duḥsaha-preṣṭha-viraha-tīvra-tāpa [BhP 10.29.10] ity ādy-uktatādṛg-avasthābhyo'
GK19gp23-33u:4038_5: kṣaṇam api kalpaṃ manvānāḥ samprati tadīya-mahā-viraha-vaha-samayam atītya cātmānaṃ tad-upekṣyatām
GK19gp23-33u:4039: apy utprekṣya lajjā-mātra-paryavasānam āsajya ca dhik-kṛtaṃ-manyā daśamīm api daśāṃ tanvānāḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:4040_0: kiṃ bahunā, bahir-antaḥ-sukumāratāyām api kaumārata eva vyādhānubiddha-snigdha-kānana-pratyāsatty-aparityāgi-mṛgīvat
GK19gp23-33u:4040_2: api hṛdayaṃ dhunvānā raso' yam iti manyamānena niṣkaruṇa-kautukena kenacid evopekṣituṃ śakyante,
GK19gp23-33u:4042: [269] tau sāsraṃ vakṣyataḥ-samprati tāḥ kāṃ gatiṃ matiṃ cāsādayanti ?
GK19gp23-33u:4044: kurvanti maunaṃ krandaṃ vā śūnyaṃ paśyati vartma vā /
GK19gp23-33u:4045: kṛṣṇaṃ vāñchanti mṛtyuṃ vā tāsām evaṃvidhā gatiḥ //JGc_1,33.109//
GK19gp23-33u:4046: [271] punas tau sāsraṃ vakṣyataḥ-samprati tāḥ prati vatsasya kā vidhitsā ?
GK19gp23-33u:4047: [272] sā vakṣyati-tad etat paścād api niścīyatām /
GK19gp23-33u:4048: yat khalu preyasāṃ premākṣemaṃ tad-bhāvanāmaya-premānurūpam eva sva-sthemānaṃ labhate /
GK19gp23-33u:4050: [273] tau vakṣyataḥ-manyāmahe tathāpy asmattaḥ saṅkocaṃ rocayiṣyati /
GK19gp23-33u:4051: [274] sā vakṣyati-bhavatāṃ hṛdi sadā vidyotamānaḥ so' yaṃ tad api vetti,
GK19gp23-33u:4053: kiṃ bahunā, bhavad-āśravam anu sarveṣām eva saṃśravaḥ pratibhāti /
GK19gp23-33u:4056: [276] sā sa-hāsaṃ vakṣyati-sa khalu līlā-naiyatyam eva tatratya-doṣatayādhyastavān /
GK19gp23-33u:4058: na tu parama-śubha-niveśa-veśa-rūpāṇām āsāṃ kleśa-leśa-praveśadā sadeśatā sambhavati /
GK19gp23-33u:4059: [277] tau vakṣyataḥ-sampraty asmābhiḥ kim iva sopānam upeyam ?
GK19gp23-33u:4061: bhavadbhis tu sarva eva vraja-janā bhojanāya praṇayena nimantrya nimantryantām /
GK19gp23-33u:4062: tarhy antaḥ-paṭī-kṣepān naṭīnām ākāra iva tat prakaṭībhaviṣyati /
GK19gp23-33u:4065: [281] ṛṣir uvāca- tataḥ sā pratyakṣata eva tāv abhi bahulam abhivadantī gṛhāya prahāpayiṣyati /
GK19gp23-33u:4066: [282] atha kathakasya manaḥ-kathā-tataś ca pūrṇimā manasi viviveca-śrī-kṛṣṇa-līlāyām anādi-siddhaṃ śrīmad-bhāgavatam eva mukhyaṃ pramāṇam /
GK19gp23-33u:4067: [283] tatra yā khalu rāsa-yoge yoga-māyām upāśritaḥ [BhP 10.29.1] ity anena nitya-vyakti-svarūpa-śakti-vṛtti-viśeṣakā yā yogamāyā tan-nirvāhakatayā bādarāyaṇinā samudīritā,
GK19gp23-33u:4069: tatra tena rāsaṃ prakāśaṃ parīkṣit-pariṣadi varṇayitvā tatra prāptam avarṇa-tritayaṃ nirasya rasyatayā samāhitam /
GK19gp23-33u:4070: tathā samprati vraje' pi tat-prasaktam iti jñātvā mayāpi samādheyam /
GK19gp23-33u:4071: tatra tejīyasāṃ na doṣāya [BhP 10.33.29] itivad atrāpi yadyapi narakād ānītā ity ādinā tal-lepa-sambhāvanāpayāpitaiva /
GK19gp23-33u:4072_0: [284] atha para-dāra-vāra-samāhāra-kāraṇān ācāraś ca yathā gopīnāṃ tat-patīnāṃ ca
GK19gp23-33u:4072_1: [BhP 10.33.25] ity anena yaṃ parihāram āpitas tathātrāpi tāś ca na kevalaṃ rāgata
GK19gp23-33u:4072_2: eva tādṛśīṃ gatim āgatāḥ ity ādinā tāsu tadīya-nityāṅganā-bhāva-vyaṅgataḥ sa ca sāṅgī-kṛtaḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:4073: [285] tathāpi nāsūyan khalu kṛṣṇāya [BhP 10.33.37] itivad asūyābhāsavattayā sambhāvitās tat-patiṃ-manyāḥ samādhātavyāḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:4074: tac ca tad-rahasyaṃ pūrvaṃ guptam āsīd iti māyā-dvārā yathā-guptaṃ samāhitam /
GK19gp23-33u:4075: sāmprataṃ tu vyaktam abhūd iti tathā tad-dvārā vyaktam eva samādheyam /
GK19gp23-33u:4076: yena ca sarveṣām api sarva-samādhānam ādheyaṃ bhavitā,
GK19gp23-33u:4078: [286] atha spaṣṭam ācaṣṭa--[287] ṛṣir uvāca-dināntare tu sarva-nimantraṇāyāṃ yathā-vṛttānte vartite sarvāḥ sādhāraṇa-mahodayāḥ śrī-rādhādayaś ca tatrāgamiṣyanti /
GK19gp23-33u:4079: kintu pūrvata eva jana-saṅgīta-vrajeśa-nirmitānaṅgīkāratām ātmano duḥkha-bhaṅgī-saṅgitāṃ maṃsyanta eva /
GK19gp23-33u:4080: tava ca rūkṣatā-vīkṣaṇena tāḥ sūkṣmāṅgatāṃ gamiṣyanti /
GK19gp23-33u:4081: tatra sāmpratam anyāsāṃ svasamāna-kanyānām aṅgīkāreṇa hṛt-kamale' pi bhaṅgitām āpatsyante /
GK19gp23-33u:4086: yadvad dṛṣṭā hari-virahitā rādhikādyāś ca tadvat //JGc_1,33.110//
GK19gp23-33u:4087: [289] tad evaṃ tāsāṃ kṛcchrāyamāṇānām amitābhyamita-tādṛśvarī śrī-vrajeśvarī tu bāṣpa-pūrṇa-nayanā paurṇamāsīṃ nirvarṇayiṣyati /
GK19gp23-33u:4088: sā tu vadiṣyati-sarve sarvato' py anvicchantu /
GK19gp23-33u:4089: yathādyatana-nimantraṇataḥ kaścid api na paścimatām añcati /
GK19gp23-33u:4091: [291] ṛṣir uvāca-tatas tad-ākarṇana-mātrataḥ sarve sarvato nirvarṇanāya saṅgatya satvaram eva cāgatya yathāvat kathayiṣyanti /
GK19gp23-33u:4092: teṣu kāścin mahilās tu kiñcid apy aprastutya śrī-rādhikādikāḥ pratyapūrvatāpūrvaṃ drakṣyanti /
GK19gp23-33u:4094: kim iva ca kiñcin na kathayatha ?
GK19gp23-33u:4099: tās tu nīcair vakṣyanti-tatrāpy etāsāṃ rādhikādikānāṃ dhṛta-tulyatā-pūrtiīr apaśyāmaḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:4100: paurṇamāsī spaṣṭaṃ vakṣyati-anyāś ca punar acchaṃ gacchantu /
GK19gp23-33u:4102: [295] ṛṣir uvāca-tato bahala-kutūhala-vahā bahulā mahilās tatra tatra gatvā jñāta-tādṛśa-tattvāḥ punaḥ paurṇamāsy-ante labdha-sattvās tadvad evāvartayiṣyanti /
GK19gp23-33u:4104: vraja-rājaś ca paurṇamāsīm anu tūrṇam āsādya prasādya ca vakṣyati-bhagavati parama-vismāpanam idam asmān bodhaya /
GK19gp23-33u:4105: [296] paurṇamāsī vakṣyati-bhavat-kanyā-bhāvābhimāninyām āryāyām idam āścaryaṃ paryavasyati /
GK19gp23-33u:4106: bhavāṃs tu sarva-vrajasthaṃ strī-puṃsa-vrajam eka-sabhānugataṃ karotu /
GK19gp23-33u:4108_0: [298] ṛṣir uvāca-tad etad avadhārya jñāta-kārya-gatinā vraja-bhūpatinā tad-abhihite
GK19gp23-33u:4108_1: tathā-vihite tava hitavatī paurṇamāsī mahitāyāṃ tasyām eva sabhāyām āhita-brahmāsanam
GK19gp23-33u:4109: tad-avyavahitam eva ca siṃha-pṛṣṭhāhitam ahita-vigrahā mahāyudhāṣṭaka-veṣṭitā devī-gaṇa-sevitā devī nabhasaḥ sarabhasam avatariṣyati /
GK19gp23-33u:4110: avatīrṇa-mātrā ca paurṇamāsyā vrajeśvarayoḥ kṛṣṇa-kṛṣṇāgrajayor anyeṣām api bhūmi-spṛśām abhūmi-spṛg-māninī yathā-nyāyam abhivādanādikam ākāśata eva prakāśayiṣyati /
GK19gp23-33u:4111: [299] tataḥ sāścaryaṃ paryavolokamāneṣu teṣu devī vakṣyati-kathaṃ veha sandehaḥ kriyate ?
GK19gp23-33u:4112: pūrvata eva tāvad ubhaya-vidhā etā nāpūrvatayā mantavyāḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:4113: pūrvāsāṃ sajātīyā dvitīyā hi yogamāyājñayā garga-vighnaṃ nighnatyā māyayā mayā nirmitāḥ /
GK19gp23-33u:4115: [300] tāś cemā gṛha-gṛhāt saṃgṛhṇāmi iti tathāhnāya sāpahnavaṃ kula-vadhū-madhye vidhāya punar vakṣyati-lakṣyatāṃ kula-pālikābhir ubhaya-vilakṣaṇatā /
GK19gp23-33u:4116: yat parama-lakṣmī-lakṣmāṇi prāg-āgatānām eva lakṣyante nārvāg-āgatānām /
GK19gp23-33u:4117: tathā maṇi-tattva-dṛśām iva tādṛśāṃ dṛṣṭibhir eva netrānandaka-saundarya-viśeṣa-vṛṣṭis tābhya eva labhyā,
GK19gp23-33u:4121: [302] ṛṣir uvāca-atha sarvābhis tathā tad āścaryaṃ sākṣātkāryamāṇam avadhārya tad-āryāṇāṃ samajyāyāṃ nivedayiṣyate-hanta yathāvad eva devī vadatīti /
